ygData.subject: Charred Guardian things
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, So now we know the breastplate comes from the clockwork EXG model (lvl 30ish) that roams the gnome castle in Solusek A. We also have pieced together the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok,

So now we know the breastplate comes from the clockwork EXG model (lvl 30ish) that roams the gnome castle in Solusek A.

We also have pieced together the fact that the charred guardian gauntlets are dropped by some efreet in Sol A, don't know exactly which mob yet though.

We also know they both add to Str and Sta, as well as look like black plate. For me, these are my two lowest melee stats and I love anything that increases BOTH, plus it is BLACK PLATE. My god, I am obsessing already.

Now, are there any other charred guardian pieces? Legs? Arms? Bracers? HELM?!

Search! Fellow dark knights, the time is at hand! Search!

Dravith Vandre'i
Fennin Ro
